channel.title: Django on Thavanathan
channel.description: Recent content in Django on Thavanathan

item.title: Web programming with Python - Django Introduction
item.description: Introduction Python’s CGI library is good enough for writing websites from ground up. But we need to put a lot of effort into it to build a usable and secure website. When building a web application we often come across some common tasks like authenticating users, connecting to a database, sending emails to users, a reliable admin interface to manage and add content to our site, etc. If we solve all of these problems ourselves, it is time-consuming.
